title: Danila Vedernikov
text:
Danila Vladimirovich Vedernikov (; born 6 June 2001) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays as a <a href="left-back">left-back</a> for <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar%20%282018%29">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a> on loan from <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Krasnodar-2">FC Krasnodar-2</a> on 17 March 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Biolog-Novokubansk">FC Biolog-Novokubansk</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Rostov">FC Rostov</a> on 21 September 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Tambov">FC Tambov</a>, substituting <a href="Khoren%20Bayramyan">Khoren Bayramyan</a> in the 88th minute.
On 3 July 2021, he returned to <a href="FC%20Volgar%20Astrakhan">FC Volgar Astrakhan</a> on loan for another season. On 21 January 2022, Rostov terminated the loan early. On 28 January 2022, he was loaned to <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar%20%282018%29">FC Kuban Krasnodar</a>.
